website_summaries.verdict: The Android-powered Motorola Moto E4 offers smooth performance and lots of features for a bargain price.
pros: Fingerprint sensor, dual-band Wi-Fi, removable battery, and expandable storage

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, fantastic price.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Christmas present for my partner, she is really happy with it, she moved from an Samsung S3, which was no longer getting updates so apps stopped being supported, such a shame as that phone was ace. But the Moto is good, she's getting used to the different interface which is more sock google like (a little different from the Samsung). Love that it still have a removable battery, a micro SD slot AND a headphone jack, high end phones have removed these, for under £100, its a steal, fantastic phone, quick, responsive and seems powerful enough for her. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. L. Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Such an amazing device especially considering the price. It just works. Almost stock android with some moto extras which adds to the experience. I think the best feature is the amazing battery on the device. Which goes forever. At this price range i dont think you can get a better device. Can get the Moto g5 which has slightly better performance but the battery is shocking. Best all rounder for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Performance and Value
customer_reviews.text: My wife has reluctantly started using a smartphone after her qwerty keyboard nokia started playing up. I believe she's a convert now. This moto e4 provides such good value and performance is quite impressive for web browsing and email etc. My daughter has a moto g4 which is also equally impressive. They both make my samsung s5 mini look like a dinosaur in comparison and they were both cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: The only reason I put 1 star is it doesn't do any less!
customer_reviews.text: This Moto E4 phones people unexpectedly, sends messages randomly, sends silly gif's I've never looked at and is causing me to have a major social crisis with all my friends, colleagues and family. I spend all my time apologising! I returned the phone for repair... it came back saying "unable to replicate the fault" Within a week it all started again.... I would not recommend the phone... Keep away!!! I am now unable to send it again to repair. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Bought this moto e4 from buyur it arrived well packed and two days earlier than stated I had telephoned buyur to double check that phone was unlocked,it was described as being sim free but I believe this is not same as unlocked, buyur confirmed it was unlocked.Really happy with phone,easy to set up and use,very happy with price and service from buyur would deal with them again.
customer_reviews.author: george campbell

customer_reviews.title: Remains excellent one year on
customer_reviews.text: Had phone a year now and super pleased. Battery lost very little in capacity and needs charge only overnight. Phone has only ever frozen once unlike previous Samsung. Only fault I can identify is that phone sometimes goes into aeroplane mode when on call ....something on touch screen and also internet connectivity can sometimes be intermittent. Overall super pleased with purchase .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very good budget phone
customer_reviews.text: This is a budget phone that manages to keep up with more expensive alternatives and has a battery that lasts me all day. My wife was so impressed by it that she bought one too.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: It's quick and has some really nice features, especially the fingerprint recognition
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and I've been really impressed. It's quick and has some really nice features, especially the fingerprint recognition. Recently I've owned phones by HTC, Samsung, Huawei and Sony, and this is up there with the best of them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr A Hall

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Phone for my wife. No complaints so must be ok
customer_reviews.author: Leonard  William Riding

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present. Supposed to be new but instructions were written on in ink. Also, the instructions were in French. Did not work at all. Have two of these phones and have had no problems with them that's why I bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: Happy  Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, battery lasts days
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, battery lasts days!!! Seems fast enough for all my needs. Quiet heavy, feels really well built. This replaced a Sony Xperia. Very pleased. Good price, great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Von

customer_reviews.title: Good phone overall
customer_reviews.text: The phone is very good overall - great screen size for what I need. Easy user interface and functionality. Good camera/video and speakers are great for music. My only bugbear is the fingerprint reader - does not recognise me despite how many times I try!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. S. L. Ewan

customer_reviews.title: Happy in the end
customer_reviews.text: The product documents supplied were in French. A complete factory reset was needed to fix the multiple problems with freezing initial startup process. All sorted with the help of the Internet and almost an hour of software updates. Not a problem! All good........ eventually
customer_reviews.author: James Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Dead pixel issue
customer_reviews.text: Loved the first Moto E, but this is not of the same quality. Had to return the first one Amazon sent me as it came with a very prominent dead pixel on the screen. When the replacement phone developed the same problem, I cut my losses and got my money back.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Hi, Is this phone supposed to come with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Hi, Is this phone supposed to come with the 10w charger ? My package only contained the usb cable for charging( no charger box ). I googled unboxing videos on YouTube, and it seems the phone should come with a 10w charger box.
customer_reviews.author: rainerpl

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought as birthday present for daughter. She is very happy with it. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Had this for 9 months and I absolutely love it. No faults, no problems. Very smooth
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Best budget phone
customer_reviews.text: Great price great phone. It's stand out feature is the battery!!!!
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, prompt delivery. 😀
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone, easy to use. You can access the internet and emails, fab little phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with this phone
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this phone. It has the longest battery life of any phone I have ever used and seems to be good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good cheap phone, camera could be better, but fair enough for the price
customer_reviews.author: Juan F.

customer_reviews.title: There are better choices
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone almost 1 year ago and I decided to change the rating from 5 to 3. In simple words Pros: +Decent battery +Cheap +Hard to brake or scratch Cons: - Heavy, seriously heavy - It's getting slower and slower - Awful fingerprint - Focus on camera is non existent If you're buying it for more than £100 it's not really worth it, really. There are phones like OnePlus 5t for £350 or Huawei p20 lite (64gb) for £250 or S7+ they are a better choice than this. Better value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Midnight

customer_reviews.title: Good phone disappointing camera.
customer_reviews.text: I like this phone, the battery lasts me for a week, its large enough to read a book or watch, Prime,Netflix or TV with ease. However, The camera is terrible, it seem incapable of giving a sharp image and has a poor depth of field, it will focus on a car number plate, but the front of the car is blurred. I will keep it because I wanted a phone that I did not constantly have to charge. Apart from the camera, it is ideal for me. (I have tried 6 different camera apps with no improvement )
customer_reviews.author: Alec

customer_reviews.title: A £600 phone for £150 what a bargain!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant phone!!! The battery can last for two days without getting charged(I played a two and a half hour movie the phone used a maximum of 20%, battery when you do need to charge the phone it has the fast charge option. You can use the phone to pay for things (android pay). The operating system is up-to-date, the fingerprint sensor is very fast , why would you want to pay £400-£500 for a phone when you can get this one for £150 ? Absolute bargain at that price . I would recommend a cover for the phone you can get one for about £4 or £5
customer_reviews.author: Mr r.r

customer_reviews.title: Easy use phone
customer_reviews.text: What a great phone I love it ,so easy to use,although I had to get my grandson to help me set it up,when it set up it is so easy to use.thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. E. Donoghue

customer_reviews.title: Not a UK phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone is advertised as "Moto E4 UK" but is NOT the UK model as it does not have a metal back and appears to have come form Italy. The give-away should have been the instruction manual which was in Italian, but the phone back and pre-installed Telecom Italia apps confirm. Also surprised that once it had got through the basic set-up, it was wanting to do an Android update. It was no surprise that the instructions for this are in Italian (despite having selected English on the set-up).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The standout feature is the battery life - way better than just about any other smartphone on the market
customer_reviews.text: The standout feature is the battery life - way better than just about any other smartphone on the market. This was my primary reason for buying it and it's delivered. The rest is standard Android without too much bloatware or customisation; no vices that I have discovered yet. Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.author: Firefly

customer_reviews.title: Moto E4 Plus phone
customer_reviews.text: Very nice phone. Still getting to grips with it but working well.
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it, lovely colour and does everything that ...
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it,lovely colour and does everything that she wants in a phone.Bought a clear back case so you can still see the gold colour through it
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Love it and the look
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Love it and the look. great value for money. takes a nano sim which i didnt see anywhere. NANO SIM NOT A MICRO SIM OR STANDARD! apart from that fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: timcon4

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great phone, easy to use and set up, clear display with excellent camera
customer_reviews.author: barry oakes

customer_reviews.title: Lags and camera is terrible. Yes
customer_reviews.text: Lags and camera is terrible. Yes, its a very cheap phone. But for the same money there are loads of superior budget phones that do not lag.
customer_reviews.author: Sayma

customer_reviews.title: Amazon  customer
customer_reviews.text: Fast postage,happy with purchase,Items as described ,would highly recommend seller
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone for the price point. Battery is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: John Redmond

customer_reviews.title: Very poor camera
customer_reviews.text: Phone was slow to arrive but it was part of the Xmas rush so that's fair enough. The phone is very fast and functional with the usual Motorola good looks however the 13mp main camera quality is either very poor or I got a dud phone. I decided to return the phone for this reason and got a Samsung s5 instead. I was disappointed with the E4 as I have used to motorola phones in the past and found them very good but no more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the money, one major fault.
customer_reviews.text: Beat phone for the price. Great value, software, hardware. Love the stock/vanilla UI with minimal but useful Moto tweaks. Red light night filter, replacing soft buttons with fingerprint sensor actions, etc. Occasionally slow on more demanding tasks but still faster and more fluid than others in the same category. Downside: alarm and timer often fail to ring, possibly due to the clock sleeping, but this understandably can cause chaos. Issue has been reported on forums to Motorola but there has been no software fix so far as they cannot replicate the issue. I will be returning the phone if I can unless they can patch the fault.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone
customer_reviews.text: I can't praise this phone enough it rocks and for less than £150 you could buy 6 for the price of the note 8 really this had the latest android 7 a massive 5000mah battery stay charged for 2 days finger print lock metal case a delight to hold .Do not waste your money on anything else it's a gem
customer_reviews.author: Michael Greenhaf

customer_reviews.title: Stay away - won't even boot at the start
customer_reviews.text: This phone is a nightmare - it is stuck on a blank screen with an arrow, clicking on which brings a "mobile services is not responding" error. Update : Motorola services gave instructions for a full factory reset and it's possible to use after that.
customer_reviews.author: Mish

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life I am happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Works well has a long battery life lots of apps cheaper than iPhone good for me
customer_reviews.author: Madds

customer_reviews.title: Very nice smartphone.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice smartphone.. I was a present and it was the highlight of the birthday...
customer_reviews.author: Tony Bodle

customer_reviews.title: ... and now i cant switch it on not very happy as you can guess
customer_reviews.text: Only had this a few weeks and now i cant switch it on not very happy as you can guess
customer_reviews.author: les

customer_reviews.title: very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Lot of phone for not much money, very happy with it,easy to use & would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Christine Penney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent battery life, maybe a bit large/heavy but not a cheap/plastic feel
customer_reviews.author: Mary G

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Avoid this phone at all costs if possible, the price to performance doesn't really cut it, the only positive I can give you is the battery life is extraordinary. And now to the biggest problem, the microphone or the antenna causing issues during calls, people on the other side of the call have issues hearing anything you say. Sent it for RMA and it still is persistent.
customer_reviews.author: Abdul M.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for such a good looking phone!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking phone, it is a lot bigger than my last phone a Motorola E3. It has a better camera and better storage and looks lush in gold colour. It was a bit of a luxury purchase for myself but I think we all deserve a treat. It's so much better for typing too with a bigger screen and I love finger print unlock on this device.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Quality Phone at Affordable Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this smart phone for my daughter, and she is very pleased with it. For a budget smart phone it is excellent quality, and with extra storage with a micro sd card there is plenty of room for all her music and photos. No hesitation in recommending this Moto E4
customer_reviews.author: Terance Rose

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant phone, fast, great camera. great battery life although a little heavy, only major fault is screen is easily damaged --- I recommend using a ptotective case
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W. Macfadyen

customer_reviews.title: Screen is good and clear
customer_reviews.text: It's a bulky hulk of a phone, but the huge battery keeps it powered for two days or more. Screen is good and clear. Not the fasted phone, but certainly not the slowest either. It has NFC so works with Android Pay but no compass. If you want a phone that powers itself for days, this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Iain

customer_reviews.title: Even better than my samsung!!
customer_reviews.text: even better than my samsung!! incredible 5000mah battery life and Dolby Atmos sound!! Best phone I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: V3D Models

customer_reviews.title: Great battery and solid build
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. Battery life is spectacular compared to similar devices (2-3 days in light to normal use, no gaming etc.).
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this for my mum and it is a good size and good looking while not noticeably much slower ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mum and it is a good size and good looking while not noticeably much slower than my more expensive phone. It has even improved her text messages.
customer_reviews.author: KC, Glasgow

customer_reviews.title: A great phone and a great price
customer_reviews.text: A great phone and a great price, sadly for me the phone could not stay connected to the Internet with out turning the phone off and on again, sham such a lovely phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jh Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain Never again will I pay £600 plus for a phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phonr overall, £150 buys you a not bad screen,android 7.1(brilliant update) usable processor and a stand out battery that will last a day even if you're a power user. This is a quarter of the price I normally pay for a phone and the only phone last lasted all day 5/5 👌
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great if you DON'T want to make calls or go online!
customer_reviews.text: It's ok to use but when charging the screen will not respond which is annoying and having looked online it seems to be a common problem. And the most annoying thing is the poor signal quality, my previous phone (Motorola 3rd gen) using the same SIM got 100% reception in the same address - this phone sometimes has no reception and can rarely connect to internet. It's ability to detect WiFi signal is also poor meaning anything online is either not possible or very slow. Again this also seems to be a common issue - I should have done more research before buying!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Haward
